com.digi.xbee.api.listeners

Interface IDiscoveryListener


  • public interface IDiscoveryListener
    Interface defining the required methods that an object should implement to be notified about device discovery events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deviceDiscovered(RemoteXBeeDevice discoveredDevice)
      Notifies that a remote device was discovered in the network.
      void discoveryError(String error)
      Notifies that an error occurred during the discovery process.
      void discoveryFinished(String error)
      Notifies that the discovery process has finished.

    • Method Detail

      • deviceDiscovered

        void deviceDiscovered(RemoteXBeeDevice discoveredDevice)
        Notifies that a remote device was discovered in the network.
        Parameters:
        discoveredDevice - The discovered remote device.
        See Also:
        RemoteXBeeDevice

      • discoveryError

        void discoveryError(String error)
        Notifies that an error occurred during the discovery process.

        This method is only called when an error occurs but does not cause the process to finish.

        Parameters:
        error - The error message.

      • discoveryFinished

        void discoveryFinished(String error)
        Notifies that the discovery process has finished.
        Parameters:
        error - The error message, or null if the process finished successfully.
